about_the_game:
Survive as long as you can. Each match you'll choose a class, loot powerful gear sets, upgrade your abilities and unlock game changing perks. Fight for survival as you race to defeat the final boss.

  • Multiplayer

  • Extraction Roguelite

  • Top-down

DOMINATE YOUR ENEMIES:
Everstorm combines elements from several emergent multiplayer game genres to give you something you have never played before.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Choose from several unlockable classes at launch.

  • Level up and upgrade your abilities.

  • Choose runic powers to unlock game changing powers.

  • Unlock seasonal Mastery Upgrades in between matches.

COMMITTED INDIE DEVELOPERS:
Everstorm is the self-funded passion project of a small but ruthlessly dedicated indie team at Thousand Hour Games. We are a team of gamers from around the world who decided to make the game that we dream of playing.

You may recognize that some our art assets - including our character models - are from the Unreal Engine Marketplace. Despite the fact that the visual appearance of our characters may appear in other indie games, our classes and characters are programmed with 100% unique spells and abilities. Everstorm's core gameplay is very different from other games that you may see using the same art assets.

We are proud of what the UE Marketplace has enabled our small team to accomplish. A competitive multiplayer game of this scale would not have been possible for our small team without it.

We have been working on Everstorm since early 2020, and with support from our players we will be able continue to improve it in the future. We want our community to feel confident in knowing that we intend to improve this game for years to come. If you want this game to be a success, please join our discord community to get involved in the development process:

content_descriptors.notes: Everstorm is a battle between fictional characters, both human and non-human. The aim of the game is to kill monsters and defeat other players.

name: Everstorm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 3250 3.5 GHz / AMD FX-4350 4.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 970 or AMD® Radeon RX 470
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 2400 3.4 GHz or i5 7400 3.5 GHz / AMD® Ryzen R5 1600X 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or AMD® Radeon RX 590
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Everstorm is an extraction dungeon crawler with top-down combat. Each raid you struggle to survive against hordes of monsters and other players. Choose a class, level up, customize your abilities, unlock game-changing perks and collect loot. Be first to defeat the boss and live to raid another day.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, German, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
